fields.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}}! 

Your reservation for {{arrive}} - {{depart}} has been confirmed and your card has been charged.

As a reminder, the cancellation policy for the {{room}} is {{room.cancellation_policy}}. You can always view, update, or cancel your reservation online at {{reservation_url}}.

Thanks, and we look forward to having you!
fields.name: Confirm and Notify Card was Charged
fields.subject: Your Reservation has been confirmed

fields.body:
Hi {{user.first_name}}, 

Thanks for your application! Sounds like you'd be a great addition to our guest quarters and we'd love to have you join us :). 

Your reservation request for {{arrive}} - {{depart}} has been tentatively approved. Please visit {{reservation_url}} to submit payment and secure your reservation. 

Thanks so much, and we look forward to having you!
fields.name: Tentatively Confirm and Request Payment
fields.subject: Action Required to Confirm your Reservation

fields.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}}! 

I wanted to send a reminder that we need a payment to secure your reservation from {{arrive}} - {{depart}}. You can visit {{reservation_url}} to pay by credit card, or respond to this email to make alternative arrangements. 

If we don't hear from you we may make the room available to other guests. If you no longer need the room, that's ok too! Just let us know or cancel your reservation online. 

Thanks, look forward to hearing from you!
fields.name: Remind Payment Needed
fields.subject: Reminder: Action Required for your Reservation

fields.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}}! 

We currently have a tentative reservation for you from {{arrive}} - {{depart}}. Do you still need the room? If you could confirm (or decline) your reservation, that would allow us to make the room available to others if you no longer need it. 

You can visit {{reservation_url}} to update your reservation status, or feel free to just respond to this email and let us know. 

Thanks, and we look forward to having you!
fields.name: Remind without Payment info
fields.subject: Reminder: Action Required for your Reservation

fields.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}}! 

You have been offered a complimentay stay for your reservation {{arrive}} - {{depart}}. We're excited to have you!

Let us know if you have any questions, and if for some reason you no longer need this reservation, please let us know (you can reply to this email) or visit {{reservation_url}} to update or cancel, so that we can make the space available to someone else. 

Thanks, and we look forward to having you!
fields.name: Offer Complimentary Stay
fields.subject: You've been offered a Complimentary Stay!
